arabicText: أَقِمِ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ لِدُلُوكِ ٱلشَّمْسِ إِلَىٰ غَسَقِ ٱلَّيْلِ وَقُرْءَانَ ٱلْفَجْرِ ۖ إِنَّ قُرْءَانَ ٱلْفَجْرِ كَانَ مَشْهُودًۭا
englishTranslationText:
Keep	 the	 prayer	 established,	 from	 the	
declining	of	 the	sun	until	darkness	of	 the	
night,	and	the	Qur’an	at	dawn;	indeed	the	
angels	 witness	 the	 reading	 of	 the	 Qur’an	
at	dawn.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Namāz	qāyim	rakho	sooraj	dhalne	se	rāt	ki	
andheri	 tak	 aur	 subha	 ka	 qurān	 be	 shak	
subha	 ke	 qurān	meiñ	Farishte	 hazir	 hote	
haiñ.

arabicText: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيْلِ فَتَهَجَّدْ بِهِۦ نَافِلَةًۭ لَّكَ عَسَىٰٓ أَن يَبْعَثَكَ رَبُّكَ مَقَامًۭا مَّحْمُودًۭا
englishTranslationText:
And	 forego	 sleep	 *	 in	 some	 part	 of	 the	
night	- an	increase	 for	 you	 **;	it	is	 likely	
your	 Lord	 will	 set	 you	 on	 a	 place	 where	
everyone	 will	 praise	 you	 ***.	 (* For 
worship. ** Obligatory only upon the 
Holy Prophet. *** On the Day of 
Resurrection.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	rāt	ke	kuchh	hisse	meiñ	tahajjud	karo	
yeh	khās	 tumhāre	liye	ziyāda		hai	qareeb	
hai	 ke	 tumheñ	 tumhāra	 Rab	 aisi	 jagah	
khada	kare	jahañ	sab	tumhāri	Hamd	kareñ

arabicText: وَقُلْ جَآءَ ٱلْحَقُّ وَزَهَقَ ٱلْبَـٰطِلُ ۚ إِنَّ ٱلْبَـٰطِلَ كَانَ زَهُوقًۭا
englishTranslationText:
And	 pray,	 “My	 Lord!	 Admit	 me	 with	 the	
truth	 and	 take	 me	 out	 with	 the	 truth	 *,	
and	 give	 me	 from	 Yourself	 a	 helpful	
dominance	**.”	(* Wherever I come or go 
** Through spread of Islam.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	yuñ	'arz	karo	ke	aey	mere	Rab" Mujhe	
sachhi	ṭarah	 dākhil	 kar	aur	 sachchi	ṭarah	
bāher	 le	 jā	 aur	 mujhe	 apni	 ṭaraf	 se	
madadgār	galba	de	.

arabicText: وَنُنَزِّلُ مِنَ ٱلْقُرْءَانِ مَا هُوَ شِفَآءٌۭ وَرَحْمَةٌۭ لِّلْمُؤْمِنِينَ ۙ وَلَا يَزِيدُ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ إِلَّا خَسَارًۭا
englishTranslationText:
And	We	 send	 down	in	 the	Qur’an	 that	which	is	 a	 cure	 for	 the	Muslims,	 and	 a	mercy	- and	it	
increases	only	ruin	for	the	unjust.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	ham	Qurān	meiñ	utārte	haiñ	woh	chiz	
jo	Imān wāloñ	ke	kiye	shifa	aur	raḥmat	hai	
aur	is	se	ẓālimo	ko	nuqsān	hi	badhta	hai	.

arabicText: وَإِذَآ أَنْعَمْنَا عَلَى ٱلْإِنسَـٰنِ أَعْرَضَ وَنَـَٔا بِجَانِبِهِۦ ۖ وَإِذَا مَسَّهُ ٱلشَّرُّ كَانَ يَـُٔوسًۭا
englishTranslationText:
And	when	We	bestow	favours	upon	man,	he	turns	away	and	goes	far	away	towards	himself;	and	
when	evil	touches	him	he	despairs.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jab	ham	ādmi	par	ehsān	karte	haiñ	muñh	pher	leta	hai	aur	apni	ṭaraf	door	hat	jāta	hai	aur	jab	
use	burāi	pahuñche	to	na	ummid	ho	jata	hai.

arabicText: قُلْ كُلٌّۭ يَعْمَلُ عَلَىٰ شَاكِلَتِهِۦ فَرَبُّكُمْ أَعْلَمُ بِمَنْ هُوَ أَهْدَىٰ سَبِيلًۭا
englishTranslationText:
Proclaim,	“Each	one	works	according	to	his	own	pattern;	and	your	Lord	well	knows	him	who	is	
more	upon	guidance.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	farmāo	sab	apne	kayende	(andāz)	par	kām	karte	haiñ	to	tumhāra	Rab	khoob	jānta	hai	koun	
ziyada	rāh	par	hai.

arabicText: وَيَسْـَٔلُونَكَ عَنِ ٱلرُّوحِ ۖ قُلِ ٱلرُّوحُ مِنْ أَمْرِ رَبِّى وَمَآ أُوتِيتُم مِّنَ ٱلْعِلْمِ إِلَّا قَلِيلًۭا
englishTranslationText:
They	ask	you	concerning	the	soul;	proclaim	“The	soul	is	an	entity	by	the	command	of	my	Lord,	
and	you	have	not	received	knowledge	except	a	little.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	tum	se	Rooh	ko	puñchte	haiñ	tum	farmāo	rooh	mere	Rab	ke	ḥukmse	ek	chiz	hai	aur	tumheñ	
Ílm	na	mila	magar	thoda

arabicText: وَلَئِن شِئْنَا لَنَذْهَبَنَّ بِٱلَّذِىٓ أَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَيْكَ ثُمَّ لَا تَجِدُ لَكَ بِهِۦ عَلَيْنَا وَكِيلًا
englishTranslationText:
And	if	We	willed	We	could	have	 taken	away	 the	revelations	which	We	have	sent	 to	you	- you	
would	then	not	find	anyone	who	could	advocate	for	you	before	Us	for	this.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	agar	ham	chahte	to	yeh	waḥi	jo	ham	ne	tumhāri	ṭaraf	ki	use	le	jāte	phir	tum	koi	na	pāte	ke	
tumhāre	liye	hamāre	huzoor	is	par	wakālat	karta.

arabicText: إِلَّا رَحْمَةًۭ مِّن رَّبِّكَ ۚ إِنَّ فَضْلَهُۥ كَانَ عَلَيْكَ كَبِيرًۭا
englishTranslationText:
Except	 the	 mercy	 of	 your	 Lord;	 indeed	
His	 munificence	 upon	 you	 (O	 dear	
Prophet	 Muhammad - peace	 and	
blessings	 be	 upon	 him)	 is	 extremely	
great.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Magar	 tumhāre	 Rab	 ki	Raḥmat	 be-shak	
tum	par		us	ka	bada	fazl	hai

arabicText: قُل لَّئِنِ ٱجْتَمَعَتِ ٱلْإِنسُ وَٱلْجِنُّ عَلَىٰٓ أَن يَأْتُوا۟ بِمِثْلِ هَـٰذَا ٱلْقُرْءَانِ لَا يَأْتُونَ بِمِثْلِهِۦ وَلَوْ كَانَ بَعْضُهُمْ لِبَعْضٍۢ ظَهِيرًۭا
englishTranslationText:
Proclaim,	“If	all	mankind	and	jinns	agree	
to	 bring	 an	 equivalent	 to	 the	 Qur’an,	
they	will	not	be	able	to	bring	its	equal	-
even	if	they	were	to	help	each	other.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	farmāo	agar	ādmi	aur jinn	sab	is	bāt	
par	 muttafiq	 ho	 jāyeñ	 ke	 is	 qurān	 ki	
mānind	le	āayeñ	to	is	ka	miṣl	na	lā	sakeñ	
ge	 agar	 che	 un	 meiñ	 ek	 doosre	 ka	
madadgār	ho

arabicText: وَلَقَدْ صَرَّفْنَا لِلنَّاسِ فِى هَـٰذَا ٱلْقُرْءَانِ مِن كُلِّ مَثَلٍۢ فَأَبَىٰٓ أَكْثَرُ ٱلنَّاسِ إِلَّا كُفُورًۭا
englishTranslationText:
And	indeed	We	have	illustrated	all	kinds	
of	examples	in	the	Qur’an	for	mankind	-
so	most	men	did	not	accept,	except	to	be	
ungrateful.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	be	shak	ham	ne	logoñ	ke	liye	is	qurān	
meiñ	har	qism	ki	maṣal	(miṣāleñ)	ṭarah
ṭarah	bayān	farmāi	to	aksar	ādmiyoñ	ne	
na	māna	magar	nā	shukr	karna

arabicText: وَقَالُوا۟ لَن نُّؤْمِنَ لَكَ حَتَّىٰ تَفْجُرَ لَنَا مِنَ ٱلْأَرْضِ يَنۢبُوعًا
englishTranslationText:
And	 they	said,	 “We	will	not	accept	 faith	
in	 you,	until	 you	cause	a	spring	 to	gush	
forth	from	the	earth	for	us.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	bole	ke	ham	hargiz	tum	par	Imān nā	
lāyeñ	 ge	 yahañ	 tak	 ke	 tum	 hamāre	liye	
zameen	se	koi	chashma	bahā	do

arabicText: وَقَالُوا۟ لَن نُّؤْمِنَ لَكَ حَتَّىٰ تَفْجُرَ لَنَا مِنَ ٱلْأَرْضِ يَنۢبُوعًا
englishTranslationText:
And	 they	said,	 “We	will	not	accept	 faith	
in	 you,	until	 you	cause	a	spring	 to	gush	
forth	from	the	earth	for	us.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	bole	ke	ham	hargiz	tum	par	Imān nā	
lāyeñ	 ge	 yahañ	 tak	 ke	 tum	 hamāre	liye	
zameen	se	koi	chashma	bahā	do

arabicText: أَوْ تَكُونَ لَكَ جَنَّةٌۭ مِّن نَّخِيلٍۢ وَعِنَبٍۢ فَتُفَجِّرَ ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرَ خِلَـٰلَهَا تَفْجِيرًا
englishTranslationText:
“Or	you	have	a	garden	of	date-palms	and	
grapes,	and	 you	make	gushing	 rivers	 to	
flow	in	it.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
.Yā	tumhāre	liye	khajooroñ	aur	angooroñ	
ka	koi	bāgh	ho	phir	tum	uske	andar	bahti	
nahreñ	rawañ	karo

arabicText: أَوْ تُسْقِطَ ٱلسَّمَآءَ كَمَا زَعَمْتَ عَلَيْنَا كِسَفًا أَوْ تَأْتِىَ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ قَبِيلًا
englishTranslationText:
“Or	you	cause	 the	sky	 to	 fall	upon	us	in	
pieces	like	you	said	- or	bring	Allah and	
the	angels	as	Witness.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Yā	tum	ham	par	āasmān	gira	do	jaisa	tum	
ne	 kaha	 hai	 tukde	 tukde	 yā	 Allah	 aur	
farishtoñ	ko	zāmin	le	āao

arabicText: أَوْ يَكُونَ لَكَ بَيْتٌۭ مِّن زُخْرُفٍ أَوْ تَرْقَىٰ فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَلَن نُّؤْمِنَ لِرُقِيِّكَ حَتَّىٰ تُنَزِّلَ عَلَيْنَا كِتَـٰبًۭا نَّقْرَؤُهُۥ ۗ قُلْ سُبْحَانَ رَبِّى هَلْ كُنتُ إِلَّا بَشَرًۭا رَّسُولًۭا
englishTranslationText:
“Or	 you	 have	 a	 house	 of	 gold,	 or	 you	
ascend	 up	 into	 heaven;	 and	 even	 then	
we	 shall	 not	 believe	 in	 your	 ascent	
unless	you	send	down	a	book	upon	us,	which	we	may	read”;	say	(O	dear	Prophet	Muhammad -
peace	 and	 blessings	 be	 upon	 him),	 “Purity	is	 to	my	 Lord	- who	 am	 I	 except	 a	 human,	 sent	 by	
Allah?”	(*	These	can	be	done,	only	when	Allah commands.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Yā	tumhāre	liye	ṭelâi	(sone)	ka	ghar	ho	ya	
tum	āasman		meiñ	chad	jāo	aur	ham	tumhāre	chad	jāne	par	bhi	hargiz	Imān na	lāyeñ	ge	jab	tak	
ham	par	ek	kitāb	na	utāro	jo	ham	padheñ	tum	farmāo	pāki	hai	mere	Rab	ko	maiñ	koun	huñ	magar	
ādmi	Allah	ka	bheja	huwa

arabicText: وَمَا مَنَعَ ٱلنَّاسَ أَن يُؤْمِنُوٓا۟ إِذْ جَآءَهُمُ ٱلْهُدَىٰٓ إِلَّآ أَن قَالُوٓا۟ أَبَعَثَ ٱللَّهُ بَشَرًۭا رَّسُولًۭا
englishTranslationText:
And	 what	 prevented	 people	 from	 believing	 when	 the	 guidance	 came	 to	 them,	 except	 their	
saying	that,	“What!	Allah has	sent	a	human	as	a	Noble	Messenger?”?
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	kis	bāt	ne	logoñ	ko	Imān lāne	se	roñka	jab	un	ke	pās	hidāyat	āayi	magar	usi	ne	ke	bole	kya	
Allah	ne	ādmi	ko	Rasool bana	kar	bheja

arabicText: قُل لَّوْ كَانَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ مَلَـٰٓئِكَةٌۭ يَمْشُونَ مُطْمَئِنِّينَ لَنَزَّلْنَا عَلَيْهِم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَلَكًۭا رَّسُولًۭا
englishTranslationText:
Proclaim,	“If	there	were	angels	walking	peacefully	on	the	earth,	We	would	send	down	only	an	
angel	from	heaven,	as	a	Noble	Messenger	towards	them.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	farmāo	agar	zameen	meiñ	farishte	hote	chain	(iṭminān)	se	chalte	to	un	par	ham	Rasool bhi	
farishta	utārte

arabicText: قُلْ كَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ شَهِيدًۢا بَيْنِى وَبَيْنَكُمْ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ بِعِبَادِهِۦ خَبِيرًۢا بَصِيرًۭا
englishTranslationText:
Proclaim,	“Allah is Sufficient	as	Witness	between	me	and	you	all;	indeed	He	is	Well	Aware	of,	
the	Beholder	of	His	bondmen.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
.Tum	 farmāo	Allah	bas	hai	gawāh	mere	tumhāre	darmiyān	be	shak	woh	apne	bandoñ	ko	jānta	
dekhta	hai

arabicText: وَمَن يَهْدِ ٱللَّهُ فَهُوَ ٱلْمُهْتَدِ ۖ وَمَن يُضْلِلْ فَلَن تَجِدَ لَهُمْ أَوْلِيَآءَ مِن دُونِهِۦ ۖ وَنَحْشُرُهُمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ عَلَىٰ وُجُوهِهِمْ عُمْيًۭا وَبُكْمًۭا وَصُمًّۭا ۖ مَّأْوَىٰهُمْ جَهَنَّمُ ۖ كُلَّمَا خَبَتْ زِدْنَـٰهُمْ سَعِيرًۭا
englishTranslationText:
And	only	he	whom	Allah guides,	is	upon	
guidance;	 and	 whomever	 He	 sends	
astray	 - you	 will	 therefore	 not	 find	 for	
them	 any	 supporters	 besides	 Him;	 and	
We	shall	raise	them	by	their	faces	on	the	
Day	 of	 Resurrection	 - blind,	 dumb	 and	
deaf;	their	destination	is	hell;	whenever	
it	is	about	to	extinguish,	We	will	inflame	
it	more	for	them.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jise	Allah	rāh	de	wohi	rāh	par	hai	aur	
jise	gumrāh	kare	to	un	ke	liye	us	ke	siwa	
koi	 himāyat	 wāle	 na	 pāo	 ge	 aur	 ham	
unheñ	Qayāmat	ke	din	un	ke	muñh			ke	
bal	 uthāeñ	 ge	 andhe	 aur	 gooñge	 aur	
bahre	 un	 ka	 thikāna	 Jahannam	 hai	 jab	
kabhi	 bujhne	 par	 āayegi ham	 use	 aur	
bhadka	deñge

arabicText: ذَٰلِكَ جَزَآؤُهُم بِأَنَّهُمْ كَفَرُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا وَقَالُوٓا۟ أَءِذَا كُنَّا عِظَـٰمًۭا وَرُفَـٰتًا أَءِنَّا لَمَبْعُوثُونَ خَلْقًۭا جَدِيدًا
englishTranslationText:
This	 is	 their	 reward	 because	 they	
disbelieved	in	Our	signs	and	said,	“When	
we	are	 bones	and	 decomposed,	will	we	
really	 be	 created	 again	 and	 raised	 up	
again?”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Yeh	 unki	 saza	 hai	 us	 par	 ke	 unhoñ	 ne	
hamāri	Āyatoñ	se	inkār	kiya	aur	bole	kya	
jab	 ham	 haddiyāñ	 aur	 reza	 reza	 ho	
jāyeñge	to	kya	sach	much	ham	naye	ban	
kar	uthāye	jāyeñge?

arabicText: ۞ أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ قَادِرٌ عَلَىٰٓ أَن يَخْلُقَ مِثْلَهُمْ وَجَعَلَ لَهُمْ أَجَلًۭا لَّا رَيْبَ فِيهِ فَأَبَى ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ إِلَّا كُفُورًۭا
englishTranslationText:
Do	 they	 not	 see	 that	 Allah Who	 has	
created	 the	 heavens	 and	 the	 earth	 is	
Able	 to	 create	 people	 similar	 to	 them,	
and	 has	 set	 a	 term	 for	 them	 in	 which	
there	is	 no	 doubt?	So	 the	 unjust	 do	 not	
accept	without	being	ungrateful.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	kya	woh	nahiñ	dekhte	ke	woh	Allah	
jis	ne	āsmān	aur	zameen	banāye	un	logoñ	
ki	miṣl	bana	sakta	hai	aur	us	ne	un	ke	liye	
ek	mi'ād	thahra	rakhi	hai	jis	meiñ	kuchh	
shubah	nahiñ	to	ƶālim	nahiñ	mānte	be	nā	
shukri	kiye

arabicText: قُل لَّوْ أَنتُمْ تَمْلِكُونَ خَزَآئِنَ رَحْمَةِ رَبِّىٓ إِذًۭا لَّأَمْسَكْتُمْ خَشْيَةَ ٱلْإِنفَاقِ ۚ وَكَانَ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ قَتُورًۭا
englishTranslationText:
Proclaim,	“If	you	owned	the	treasures	of	
the	mercy	of	my	Lord,	you	would	hoard	
them	 too	 for	 fear	 that	 they	 may	 get	
spent; and	man	is	a	big	miser.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	 farmāo	 agar	 tum	 log	 mere	 Rab	 ki	
Raḥmat	 ke	 khazānoñ	 ke	 mālik	 hote	 to	
unheñ	bhi	rok	rakhte	is	dar se	ke	kharch	
na	ho	jāyeñ	aur	ādmi	bada	kanjoos	hai

arabicText: وَلَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَا مُوسَىٰ تِسْعَ ءَايَـٰتٍۭ بَيِّنَـٰتٍۢ ۖ فَسْـَٔلْ بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ إِذْ جَآءَهُمْ فَقَالَ لَهُۥ فِرْعَوْنُ إِنِّى لَأَظُنُّكَ يَـٰمُوسَىٰ مَسْحُورًۭا
englishTranslationText:
And	 indeed	 We	 gave	 Moosa	 nine	 clear	
signs,	 therefore	 ask	 the	 Descendants	 of	
Israel	 when	 he	 came	 to	 them	 - in	
response	Firaun	said,	“O	Moosa	- I	think	you	are	under	a	magic	spell.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	be	shak	Ham	ne	Mūsā ko	nau	roshan	nishāniyañ	diñ	to	bani	Isrāel	se	puñcho	jab	woh	un	ke	
pās	āaya	to	is	se	fir'aun	ne	kaha	aey	Mūsā" Mere	khayāl	meiñ	to	tum	par	jādu	huwa

arabicText: قَالَ لَقَدْ عَلِمْتَ مَآ أَنزَلَ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ إِلَّا رَبُّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ بَصَآئِرَ وَإِنِّى لَأَظُنُّكَ يَـٰفِرْعَوْنُ مَثْبُورًۭا
englishTranslationText:
He	 said,	 “You	 certainly	 know	 that	 these	 have	 not been	 sent	 down	 except	 by	 the	 Lord	 of	 the	
heavens	 and	 the	 earth,	 the	 eye-openers	 *	 for	 the	 hearts;	 and	 I	 think	 that	 you,	 O	 Firaun,	 will	
surely	be	ruined.”	(*	The	signs	which	enlighten	the	hearts.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kaha	yaqeenan	to	khoob	jānta	hai	ke	inheñ	na	utāra	magar	āasmānoñ	aur	zameen	ke	mālik	ne	dil	
ki	ānkheñ	kholne	wāliyāñ	aur	mere	gumān	meiñ	to	aey	fir'aun	to	zaroor	halāk	hone	wāla	hai
